item.title: Standardization in sparse penalized regressions (2)
item.description: In the first post of the series, we learnt that it’s recommended to standardize the input data before performing sparse penalized regressions and four standardization methods (Z-score, Gelman, Bring, Min-max) have been introduced with example R code.

item.title: Standardization in sparse penalized regressions (1)
item.description: Sparse penalized regressions (e.g. lasso, elastic-net, SCAD) are popular statistical models that can simultaneously conduct variable selection and coefficient estimation.
